subject: Re: Inoue Genzaburo & family

Yes,  Inoue Touzaemon was in fact Inoue Matsugorou I.  (Inoue Matsugorou II=
 was born 
Inoue Matsujirou.)

Merry Christmas, everyone!

~Seven


--- In =
